Welcome to Sidney Phillips

Pubs for sale in the UK

including Licensed Businesses and Freehouses throughout England and Wales.

Sidney Phillips are specialists in pub and other licensed property sales and valuations with six regional offices offering pubs for sale throughout England and Wales.

We offer a constantly updated register of pubs for sale and other licensed properties for sale throughout England and Wales.

WE SELL PUBS - ITS OUR LIVING!

Our associated divisions include Sidney Phillips Innplan insurance, Sidney Phillips Business Mortgages and Utility Helpline.

Sidney Phillips national network deal with sales, valuations and insurance of licensed businesses which include public houses, freehouses, hotels, restaurants, clubs and leisure units.

  • Licensed Businesses, Freehouses and Pubs for Sale in UK
    Sidney Phillips Ltd, Chartered Surveyors are licensed property agents, Valuers and business transfer agents covering England and Wales providing pubs for sale, hotel and restaurant sales, freehouses and licensed businesses for sale, pub tenancies, country hotels, country inns, city centre and urban pubs, discos and clubs for sale throughout the UK.

  • Financing your Pub or Hotel Purchase
    Sidney Phillips Business Mortgages, Licensed trade mortgage brokers raising finance for pub and hotel purchase in UK, assistance with brewery finance, loans on pub leases, guidance for buyers.

  • Licensed Trade Insurance for the UK
    Providing SP Innplan Insurance for public houses and hotels, competitive quotes on insurance renewal, comprehensive licensed trade insurance package for the UK. Authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority for the conduct of general insurance business.

  • Pub and Hotel Valuations in England and Wales
    Pub and Hotel valuations plus business appraisals in England and Wales including brewer’s tenancy valuations.

  • Guidance about Buying a Pub or other Licensed Business
    Providing guidance for newcomers for pub tenancies including business assessment, profit margins, freehold and leasehold procedures and policies.

  • Professional Standards
    Sidney Phillips are proud to be Chartered Surveyors, operating under a strict and ethical Code of Conduct. Sidney Phillips has in place a Complaints Handling Procedure in compliance with RICS regulations.
